name: Boba Fett Helmet™
description: Boba Fett™ is a renowned bounty hunter in the Star Wars™ galaxy, known for his formidable Mandalorian™ armor and skills. He is an unaltered clone of Jango Fett™, raised as his son, and emulates his father's legacy. Boba Fett's career spanned the Galactic Republic™, Empire™, and criminal underworld, earning him a reputation as one of the galaxy's most feared hunters.
